attributes.action: immediately remove convicted criminals serving custodial sentences in UK prisons from the list of those who do not need to purchase  a television licence to lawfully watch television.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Convicted criminals, in our prisons, are presently on the list of Crown Exemptions and don't need to buy a televison licence.  This can only be interpreted as convicted criminals being granted preferential treatment, and being rewarded, by the government, for their criminal activity, while MOST law-abiding members of the population will become criminalised when they watch television without purchasing a televison licence.
